body.name: Logitech POP Keys Mechanical Wireless Keyboard with Customizable Emoji Keys, Durable Compact Design, Bluetooth or USB Connectivity, Multi-Device, OS Compatible - Heartbreaker Rose (Renewed)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 19 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: Deep feels: Neon corals meet crushed raspberry colors on a keyboard designed for the ones who care the most, allowing you to change the game with POP Keys wireless mechanical keyboard in Heartbreaker Rose
Feelings at your fingertips: Unleash your online personality with 8 swappable emoji keys and 1 emoji menu key, all customizable via Logitech Software (on Windows and macOS only)
Fun bouncy typing: Experience typing that’s almost addictive on typewriter-style mechanical keys; feel your fingers bounce across the comfy, scooped keys as they click, clack and pop
Multi-device: Pair POP Keys with up to 3 devices and hop between them using the Easy-Switch keys; connect via Bluetooth or Logi Bolt USB receiver on Windows, macOS, Chrome OS, Android, iPadOS or iOS
Yours for the long haul: Express yourself to your heart’s content with this wireless external keyboard, featuring 3-year battery life and keys engineered to endure up to 50 million strokes
Feel-better factor: This compact, portable keyboard is designed to encourage better shoulder positioning and body posture, and features a space-saving design for easy storage
Aesthetic match: Pair your POP Keys with POP Mouse, the comfy and quiet mouse made for working anywhere, with a customizable top button that opens a world of emojis and shortcuts
body.description: This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: First, this keyboard is cute. And it’s incredibly fun to type on. Has the classic mechanical keyboard touch, but is also very smooth. If I’m typing quickly, I find it’s very easy for my fingers to slip and type a wrong key - sometimes while barely even bumping. It’s great that the keys are so responsive, just had a bit of a learning curve, even for advanced typists. Battery life has been great so far, and it’s very easy to switch paired device. Overall highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and functional
reviews.reviewText: I wanted an extra keyboard for my laptop to maintain good posture. I use it sitting and standing. I love the colors, the emoji buttons and the sound and feel of the keys. It’s very satisfying to use :) I also have the matching mouse, so it’s very aesthetically pleasing :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love how tactile the keys are, the clicking is very satisfying when typing. The only slight downside I would say is that since the keys are circular, it does take a bit of time to get used to typing on it and not accidentally hitting the wrong key. I had a lot of typos when first using it, but you eventually get the hang of it. The key colors and emoji keys are super cute too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: it works well. I'm satisfied with the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mechanical keyboard lovers
reviews.reviewText: 10/10 best clickity clackity portable mechanical keyboard! It may be small but it is mighty! I use this keyboard for college, gaming, my phone/iPad, work, whatever really I need a keyboard for honestly. Easily connects and remembers up to 3 devices via Bluetooth. Does have a usb connection piece. Is not rechargeable but battery life is great (I always shut off after using). The keys are easy to remove. Comes with 4 other emoji button options. The colors are vibrant and really do pop! The sound of the mechanical keys is sharp and what any lover of mechanical keys are looking for! The price point is high but this keyboard is above and beyond amazing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars El producto me llego incompleto.
reviews.reviewText: Le faltan unas teclas de emoticon que no llegaron y la bolsita que tiene por dentro para guardar las teclas adicionales no estaba.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazingly versatile and cute as a button
reviews.reviewText: I love this keyboard so much that I just ordered another one that I don't need in a different color, just because they are so cute and so good. They are super easy to pair and to switch between devices at the press of a button. The mechanical switches are wonderfully tactile and give good audio feedback. Some of the emoji buttons are swappable and they make inserting emojis really easy. Note, however, that you would need to install the Logitech software specific to this keyboard in order to take advantage of the emoji insertion feature, and from what I remember, it is not available for Mac or for Android. The keyboard still works with all platforms no problem otherwise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Necesita soporte de muñecas
reviews.reviewText: Muy buen producto, robusto, se siente de buen material pero no dice en ninguna parte que es tan alto que necesita apoya muñecas. Lo había comprado pensando en llevarlo a la oficina pero al ser tan alto, duelen las muñecas para escribir y necesita un soporte para las manos para escribir bien en el lo cual me complica la movilidad del mismo diariamente. Por ese motivo lo devolví. Si es para un puesto fijo lo recomiendo pero para movilizarlo diariamente no pues el soporte de manos suma peso y espacio para su trasporte.
My wife really love this keyboard, she has been using for some months and not any complaints, just happiness...

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy lindo teclado... pero venía abierto
reviews.reviewText: Desconozco si el artículo sea de segunda mano o simplemente se abriera en la aduana, los sellos de seguridad venían rotos y únicamente tenía un pedazo de cinta adhesiva para mantener la caja cerrada. La envoltura en la que venía el teclado era un plástico en lugar del papel con el logo de logitech que debería, fuera de eso todo parece estar bien, el teclado no incluye la letra ñ. Las teclas se sienten muy bien son suaves, pero se siente claramente que es un teclado mecánico. Adicional, requiere presionar la tecla de forma "profunda" como en una máquina de escribir, por lo que personas de dedos grandes podrían tener problemas, aunque es fácil acostumbrarse. Por último, ES UN TECLADO INALAMBRICO, pero duran bastante las baterías (no incluidas).
Très beau design mais A utiliser si 100% télétravail, trop lourd pour être transporté
Esta bonito pero la teclas no coinciden con lo que pretendo escribir, he estado buscando los signos y los he encontrado en teclas diferentes. Y las teclas emoji no se ora que son
I got sent a defective keyboard, the batter port has no spring so the batteries never wont connect, its just beautiful trash now
